verses.verse: (Lam. 3:55) If You, LORD, should mark iniquities, O Lord, who could ((Ps. 143:2)) stand?
But there is ((Nah. 1:6; Mal. 3:2); Rev. 6:17) forgiveness with You, That ((Ex. 34:7; Neh. 9:17; Ps. 86:5; Is. 55:7; Dan. 9:9)) You may be feared.
((1 Kin. 8:39, 40; Jer. 33:8, 9)) I wait for the LORD, my soul waits, And ((Ps. 27:14)) in His word I do hope.
(Ps. 119:81) My soul waits for the Lord More than those who watch for the morning— Yes, more than those who watch for the morning.
(Ps. 119:147) O Israel, hope in the LORD; For (Ps. 131:3) with the LORD there is mercy, And with Him is abundant redemption.
And ((Ps. 86:5, 15; Is. 55:7)) He shall redeem Israel From all his iniquities.

Simple Trust in the LORD A Song of Ascents. Of David. [1] LORD, my heart is not haughty, Nor my eyes lofty. ((Ps. 103:3, 4); Luke 1:68; Titus 2:14) Neither do I concern myself with great matters, Nor with things too profound for me.
Surely I have calmed and quieted my soul, (Jer. 45:5; (Rom. 12:16)) Like a weaned child with his mother; Like a weaned child is my soul within me.
((Matt. 18:3; 1 Cor. 14:20)) O Israel, hope in the LORD From this time forth and forever.
The Eternal Dwelling of God in Zion A Song of Ascents. [1] LORD, remember David And all his afflictions;
How he swore to the LORD, ((Ps. 130:7)) And vowed to (Ps. 65:1) the Mighty One of Jacob:
“Surely I will not go into the chamber of my house, Or go up to the comfort of my bed;
I will (Gen. 49:24; Is. 49:26; 60:16) not give sleep to my eyes Or slumber to my eyelids,
Until I (Prov. 6:4) find a place for the LORD, A dwelling place for the Mighty One of Jacob.”
Behold, we heard of it (1 Kin. 8:17; 1 Chr. 22:7; Ps. 26:8; Acts 7:46) in Ephrathah; (1 Sam. 17:12) We found it (1 Sam. 7:1) in the fields of the woods.
Let us go into His tabernacle; (1 Chr. 13:5) Let us worship at His footstool.
(Ps. 5:7; 99:5) Arise, O LORD, to Your resting place, You and (Num. 10:35) the ark of Your strength.
Let Your priests (Ps. 78:61) be clothed with righteousness, And let Your saints shout for joy.
